alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Decatur, southern Miller, southwestern Mitchell, southwestern Baker and northeastern Seminole Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colquitt, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Bainbridge, West Bainbridge, Iron City, Brinson, Ausmac, Babcock, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Boykin, Cyrene, Sharphagen, Enterprise and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
